column1: Smoque BBQ////The best barbecue joint in all of Chicago. The meats are so juicy and tender
column2: and will melt in your mouth the moment you eat it. Sandwiches are served on large brioche buns
column3: good for soaking up extra sauce. Carolina and Kansas City style sauces are both excellent choices
column4: but my person favorite is the sweeter Kansas City. Almost as important as the meat
column5: the sides are top tier as well. The mac and cheese is gooey and topped with bread crumbs while the fries not run of the mill and above average for a barbecue restaurant. The line may be a turn off
column6: but it's well worth the wait and moves fast. Also
